description: Mix of sarcastic/absurd suggestions (5 AM yoga, bowling alley board meeting, skydiving) and 2 real events (quarterly review Tuesday 2 PM, design sync Wednesday 10 AM).

events.title: Quarterly Review
events.reasoning: Alice and Bob agreed on a quarterly review for next Tuesday at 2 PM in Conference Room B. This is a concrete plan.

events.title: Design Team Sync
events.reasoning: Alice asked Bob to set up a 30-minute sync with the design team for Wednesday morning at 10 AM.

mock_llm_response.summary: Found 2 real events: quarterly review (Tuesday 2 PM) and design sync (Wednesday 10 AM). Ignored sarcastic suggestions (5 AM yoga, bowling alley, skydiving).

notes: Reference datetime is Friday 2026-02-20, so 'next Tuesday' is 2026-02-24 and 'Wednesday' is 2026-02-25. Three sarcastic suggestions should be ignored. Relaxed tolerance due to mixed signals.
